name: Clash of crime gangs in mad Vegas
name_original: Clash of crime gangs in mad Vegas
description:
Wellcome to criminal America! Carl Andreas city, nicknamed Grand tough guy go to Vegas for new criminal adventures! Vegas gangs not welcome to him, but our tough guy do not ask them about it. All what he need, he just takes it. In Vegas he got in clash of city mafia crime war. It is real criminal war of mafia. Tough guy need help of his friend Tony and Tony's gang. But before this need do some dirty job for Tony.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful America "grand auto" style landscape
- Theft cars right on streets with throwing driver out
- Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists (jab, hooks and others) and kick (4 types of kick)
- Many blows
- Moto, auto, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code
- Mad streets full of vice and sins

Download Clash of crime gangs in mad Vegas for free and win the mafia war between city gangster bands.
